text:
@perlmutations Probably not his fault COVID-19 started, but it sure as shit is his fault that it's such a huge problem in the US, with no end in sight.
He's completely failing the US.
#TrumpVirusCatastrophe #TrumpVirusCoverup #DumpTrump 
#VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica2020
